_header: Seigneurs that solemn were assembled them all samen
Subjects: laments; Berkeley, John, sir, of Wymondham (Leics.)
_description: A lament for Sir John Berkeley of Wymondham, Leicestershire (c. 1375) — 91 alliterative long lines with end rhyme, usually in couplets

NottsULMi01.First Lines:
Seyngurs þat solem weer sembled hem al samenÞat were
                    gra[c]ious & gode & glad of þer gamen…
NottsULMi01.Last Lines:
…Hie þe hom hastili and þou salt haue þi
                    hireFor woth mi dere derling to dali I desire
NottsULMi01.Editions:
Turville-Petre,  Thorlac. 
             “The Lament for Sir John Berkeley.” 
             Speculum
         57 (1982): 332-8: 336-8.
